function_description: Create a new project to organize boards.
initial_state: User is logged into the 4ga Boards web app and is on the dashboard page. No existing projects are created.
steps: Locate and click the 'Create Project' button on the dashboard.
Enter the project name in the provided field.
Confirm the creation by clicking the 'Save' or 'Create' button.
expected_state: A new project is created and displayed on the dashboard, serving as a container for boards.
